国家自然科学基金委员会 ... 农业技术员 agrotechnician 兽医师 veterinarian 畜牧师 engineer.
... 「正式」的一个英文说法就是 " full-fledged"， 「兽医」是 " veterinarian"， 「宣誓典礼」的英文就叫做 " swearing-in ceremony"，.

entry.def: A veterinarian is a person who is qualified to treat sick or injured animals.

means.word_mean: 1. a doctor who practices veterinary medicine
